The [[free peoples]] of [[Middle-earth]] struggle against the [[Sauron|forces]] of [[darkness]].|Official Synopsis, [[Amazon Studios]]}} '''Shadow and Flame''' is the sixteenth episode of [[Amazon Studios]]'s television series, ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]''. It is the eighth episode of the second season and it was released on [[3 October|October 3]], [[2024]]. ==Synopsis== == Cast == === Credited === :''In order of appearance'' (in episode credits) {| class="wikitable mw-collapsible" |- ! [[Arkie Reece]] || Additional Voice Work |} == Trivia == Below is a list of trivia from Amazon's "X-Ray" feature that accompanied the episode. * Scene 2 - "Most of the details and elaborations told herein are derived from '[[The Lord of the Rings]]', its prologue entitled '[[Concerning Hobbits]]', and its [[Appendices]], [[Appendix A|A]] through [[Appendix F|F]], where the intrepid traveler may journey to discover even farther horizons." == Production == == Differences == == Reception == {{references}} {{rop-episodes}} [[Category:The Rings of Power (TV series) episodes|16]]
